articles.description: Despite the chemistry between Law’s Dumbledore and Mikkelsen’s Grindelwald, this third prequel is a lumbering creature
articles.content: The replacement of Johnny Depp by Mads Mikkelsen as Gellert Grindelwald (Dumbledores lost love, now intent on dominion over the magic world and war with the muggles) results in a marked improvement o… [+754 chars]

articles.title: Jack White marries musician Olivia Jean in on-stage surprise - The Guardian
articles.description: Star proposes in Detroit while singing lyric ‘let’s get married’, before ceremony performed by label co-founder
articles.content:
Jack White surprised fans by marrying the musician Olivia Jean on stage during his Detroit homecoming show on Friday.
The Detroit-born singer, songwriter and producer invited Jean onstage to join hi… [+783 chars]
